Package Math

Class Vector2f

java.lang.Object
Math.Vector2f
public class Vector2f extends Object
This is the Vector2f class, 2 element vector that is represented by x y coordinates, this class contains all the necessary functions to work with Vector2f

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    This is the x coordinate of the Vector2f

    This is the y coordinate of the Vector2f
